markdownRemark.html:
Hi there! Thanks for coming to my website.

I recently graduated from Georgia Tech and will be working at LinkedIn post June as a new grad software engineer.

I previously held internships at LinkedIn, PlayStation, and Siemens.

What I do in my free time:

  • Table tennis 🏓 (I was formerly a top 1, top 4, and top 10 ranked junior athlete in the U.S.). See my LinkedIn for more
  • Investing 📈 (quantitative + discretionary)
  • Movies + dramas 🎥
  • Make beats 🎶
  • Work on ideas from time to time 💡
